org.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM issue_relations WHERE issue_relations.issue_from_id = "$1" AND issue_relations.issue_to_id IN ("$2", "$3", "$4")

rewrites.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM issue_relations WHERE issue_relations.issue_from_id = "$1" AND issue_relations.issue_to_id IN ("$2", "$3", "$4") LIMIT 1
